text: Goworów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Międzylesie, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately east of Międzylesie, south of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 330. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Goworów
